name: The Lone Wolf
description:
The Lone Wolf is another "True crime" case in the True Crime Investigation line. It is 56 pages long and labeled for 18+. It contains several maps and a chase that will remind you of classics like Sev7n, Silence of the Lambs or Mind Hunters.

For weeks the crimes of the Lone Wolf have continued, with no clue as to his identity, except for his footprints, which he brazenly leaves behind, knowing that they will reach the avid eyes of the police. The agents in charge will fight against his discredit as they examine gruesome crime scenes and interview the worst killers of their time to understand what is going on and how to catch the culprit.
